name: WF103 - GitHub Auto-Export
description: Exports all n8n workflows to GitHub repository every 15 minutes

nodes.name: Every 15 Minutes
nodes.description: Triggers every 15 minutes to export workflows

nodes.name: Get All Workflows
nodes.description: Fetches all workflows from n8n API
nodes.needs: HTTP Header Auth credential with X-N8N-API-KEY

nodes.name: Format for Export
nodes.description: Formats workflows as JSON files for GitHub

setup_required.step_1: Create HTTP Header Auth credential in n8n
setup_required.step_3: Set header value: '[n8n API key from settings]'
setup_required.step_4: Add GitHub API nodes to actually push files

future_enhancements: Add GitHub API integration to actually commit files
Add error handling for failed exports
Add Slack notification on export completion
